metadata.description:
The Ancient Clock Tower | NFT & Interactive

1FL. The Everlasting Clock Square
On the first floor of the tower is a giant clock tower. This clock is a clock that connects the magical world and the human world when it's time to work. The fairies spirit at that time would come to this clock courtyard. and set out to explore people at that hour. What will they find during their journey?

The most important thing is you every supporter. In return for this invaluable support, We will strive to make the work worthwhile. and give you the best. So we have created this website to make you enjoy form the characters story and we have prepared a lot of special content for you to enjoy with your NFT in the interactive website.

ðŸ•” https://www.bannodiary.com/theclocktower/

After collecting the NFT, Artist will contact the collector to give the coupon gift code to open special content later. 
Thank you for support
